This "Planeten - The Planet" is a great dokumentary series with English audio and Swedish subtitles, It is strongly recommended.

I also recommend the films that are linked above: "An Inconvenient Truth" and "Who Killed the Electric Car ?"
Especially "An Inconvenient Truth"! Everybody should definitely see this film. Even if you are a sceptic, non believer or just plain stupid: this film will affect you!
I Dare you - SEE IT and prove me wrong! This is an important film. BUT! It's hope inspiring and entertaining, never boring or uninteresting!
So i warmly recommend this movie! SEE THIS MOVIE! ( ALSO )
